title: Clubs Glitching?
body: Before the client update I was in a club with my friends called Everything For Scuttle with the tag [EFS]. From what I remember I was the owner of this club but when I updated my client I was mysteriously kicked out of the club. None of my friends said that they did anything, and one was confused if she was the leader or not (since I was the leader to begin with and it must have switched leaders). I didn't care too much at the time up until today when I tried to create a new club. It said that to create the club I have to have played at least 1 game (which I most definitely have), and cannot be an owner of a club. My guess is while I am not part of a club, that client still believes that I am (hence "glitch"). If anyone knows how to fix, or can fix, this problem, it would be much appreciated!!!!

replies.body: Okay Cool! It works! Thank You!!

There was a club [outage ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)that caused some issues, including some club owners not be able to see their club.  Your club still exists and you are still the owner.  

Your club should be refreshed now, so relog and check it out.  Let me know!
